participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, she is focused on her goals and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. i'm currently in high school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and knowledgeable, he has a passion for storytelling and enjoys sharing life experiences.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.
